scn

Class Shop

  • java.lang.Object
    • scn.Scene
      • scn.Shop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    input.EventHandler 

    public class Shop
extends Scene

    Shop

    The Class that is run when the Game is successfully finished/won. represents the in-game shop.

    Author:
    Richard Kirby

      • checkForPurchase

        public boolean checkForPurchase()
        This method checks that the boundaries of the mouse cursor are over a purchasable item. Also ensures that the player has sufficient funds to purchase the item selected
        Returns:
        true when mouse is over an item and the player has enough money
